synthesis_conditions.label: 3DED data collection
equipment: JEOL JEM2100 TEM operating at 200 kV
Timepix detector from Amsterdam Scientific Instruments
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: BSS crystals from BSS-PB (centrifuged out of suspension and washed with water)
synthesis_conditions.time: Data collected while continuously rotating the crystal at 0.45° s−1
synthesis_conditions.indexing_results: A few of the data sets could be indexed to a triclinic unit cell
synthesis_conditions.structure_solution_attempts: No reasonable structure model was obtained

synthesis_conditions.label: 3DED data collection and analysis for BSS-SA
equipment: JEOL JEM2100 TEM operating at 200 kV
Timepix detector from Amsterdam Scientific Instruments
synthesis_conditions.time: Data collected while continuously rotating the crystal at 0.45° s−1
synthesis_conditions.indexing_results: Data sets from 18 crystallites could be indexed with a triclinic unit cell
synthesis_conditions.structure_solution_attempts: Initial structure solution attempted on individual 3DED data sets but was unsuccessful
synthesis_conditions.data_merging_strategy: Hierarchical clustering analysis performed to merge data sets that were most similar in terms of measured reflection intensities
synthesis_conditions.final_structure_solution: Structure solution by direct methods using the data of the large cluster, composed of 12 individual data sets with overall completeness of 84.6%

synthesis_conditions.label: Laboratory synthesis of BSS
synthesis_conditions.equipment: 5 mL Pyrex tube sealed with a PTFE cap
chemicals_used: 72 mg bismuth(III) oxide (Aldrich, 99.999% trace metal basis)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Filtered off, washed with 50 mL of hot deionized water (>95 °C)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Left to dry in ambient conditions overnight
